bearing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the way in which you move, stand, or behave, especially when this shows your character
bearing.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a direction or angle that is shown by a compass
bearing.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: learning to take a compass bearing
bearing.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a part of a machine that turns on another part, or in which a turning part is held
